shows.title: Universe & Consciousness / New UAP Hearing
shows.first_half: First Half: Author Marsha Sims joins George Noory to discuss the frontiers of science, consciousness, God, and the universe. Her hypothesis is that we live in a physical universe of matter and energy that is a virtual simulation thought into existence by a universal consciousness.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Ufologist and lobbyist Stephen Bassett is attending a new congressional hearing on the UAP subject being held on May 1st. He'll bring us reportage and commentary on the meeting, and reveal if there was new credible information presented.

shows.title: Conspiracy Theories / Channeled Wisdom
shows.first_half: First Half: Publisher of Skeptic Magazine, Michael Shermer, will discuss conspiracies and conspiracy theorists. He'll reveal how to tell if a conspiracy theory might be true, is totally false, or lacks rationality.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Author and spiritual coach Roger Burnley will share the astonishing discovery that changed his life and could change lives for millions more. He channels a source of timeless intelligence and higher wisdom and will discuss how the messages come through, and why they offer a roadmap to success and self-actualization.

shows.title: Alternative Health / Witchcraft & the Afterlife
shows.guests: Dr. Joel Wallach, Melissa St. Hilaire
shows.first_half: First Half: Dr. Joel Wallach will discuss the ability to achieve healing through the benefits of natural remedies that aid in the body’s recovery from chronic conditions that plague Americans today.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Paranormal investigator and esoteric teacher Melissa St. Hilaire will talk about being an American witch. She'll destigmatize witchcraft and bring us the true meaning of what it means, as well as discuss animal communication and the afterlife.

shows.title: JFK Assassination Files / Conversations with God
shows.first_half: First Half: Investigative reporter Mark Shaw will bring us the evidence presented at the recent task force hearing dealing with newly released JFK files. According to Shaw, the revealed information sheds new light on the JFK assassination.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Author and researcher Neale Donald Walsch will discuss his 30 years of experiences while writing his ‘Conversations with God’ dialogue series. He'll share what he considers to be the 10 most life-changing messages he has received and the six-step process he uses in his research and writings.

shows.title: WWII Cover-Ups / Soul Frequencies & Healing
shows.first_half: First Half: Journalist and author Brian T. Brown will discuss the conspiracies and cover-ups that followed the first-ever nuclear explosion (the July 1945 Trinity Test). He'll examine Christopher Nolan’s "Oppenheimer" and make the case that it was not necessary to use atomic bombs on Japan.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Medical medium and spiritual teacher Kimberly Meredith will offer her unique blend of ancient teachings, quantum consciousness, and healing techniques. She'll demonstrate how she gets messages from the afterlife through her guides and also discuss angel numbers, soul frequencies, and energetic miracles.

shows.title: Cardio Health / Open Lines
shows.first_half: Natural health advocate John Hewlett, winner of the 2025 Product of the Year Award in Top Doctor Magazine, joins Connie Willis (info) in the first half. Known as "That Cardio Guy," Hewlett discusses his search, findings, and successes for non-invasive solutions for genetic and stress-related heart issues. Followed by Open Lines in the latter half.
